id.description: The unique identifier for the feedback.

restauranteId.description: The ID of the restaurant related to this feedback.

nomeCliente.description: The name of the customer providing the feedback.

avaliacao.description: The rating provided by the customer, typically between 1 and 5.

comentario.description: Optional comment provided by the customer.

dataHoraCriacao.description: The date and time when the feedback was created.
